name: Grim Tales Server Mod
description:
Server Mod for Grim Tales server.
-Balances all weapons and armor to DLC levels, removes special effects.
-Pacifies pets and thralls.
-Adds recipes for EE/DMT items.
-Adds some new items.
-Adds thrall recipes to players.
changeNote:
-Gave piglet and hare more HP so they don't get one shot
-Added khitan coins and drink
-Moved some thrall recipes to GT Common Knowledge and made them autolearned
-Added zamorian dancer set to GT Armor
author: Grim Tales
